Texts.Chs: 把^orange;5个寂灭锭^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;5 Quietus Bars^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我可以提供6000像素的任务奖励，只要你抽出一点时间就可以拿到这笔丰厚的奖赏。我需要^orange;5个寂灭锭^reset;。你能将它带来给我吗？
Texts.Eng: I'm offering 6000 pixels for a bit of aid, if you can spare a few moments? I need 5 ^orange;quietus bars^reset; in order to finish my work. Can you bring some to me?

Texts.Chs: 做得好。这是我的承诺：像素。
Texts.Eng: Well done, ol' chap. As promised: The cash. Enjoy.
